text: Ladin (, also ; autonym: , ; ) is a variant of the Romance language. It is spoken in Northern Italy in the provinces of South Tyrol, Trentino, and Belluno. == Related pages == * Romance languages * South Tyrol == References == Category:Romance languages Category:Languages of Italy Category:Trentino- Alto Adige/SÃ¼dtirol
